responses: Hello, Kindly choose from one of the following to get started.

BLDEA's V.P. Dr. P.G. Halakatti College of Engineering & Technology, Vijayapura, Karnataka, is among the top engineering colleges in the state. Spanning 14.9 acres, it is AICTE-approved, NBA-accredited, and affiliated with VTU. Offers UG & PG programs in various engineering disciplines, along with MBA & MCA. Known for academic excellence and industry relevance.For more details, please choose from the below options.
Dr. V. G. Sangam, Principal,B.L.D.E.A V. P. Dr. P.G.H. College of Engineering & Technology, Vijayapura, Karnataka, India

The college's team of highly skilled and qualified faculty members is continually improving the process of teaching and learning to transform their students into competent technocrats who can help our nation and the world and create a better tomorrow.On behalf of BLDEACET, I welcome all the prospective students who hope to begin their career with us and wish the current students all the best in their future endeavours.
Dr. M.B. Patil,President

BLDEA's mission is to serve the less privileged and create a just and meaningful society. I am confident that BLDEA has always stood by its mission and made a substantial contribution to change the lives of the people of North Karnataka since its inception.
We have 2000+ students studying with us.
To visit the campus you can proceed by choosing further below options.
The address of BLDEA's V.P. Dr. P.G. Halakatti College of Engineering and Technology is: Ashram Road, Vijayapura-586101, Karnataka, India
You can visit us from Monday to Friday between 9 AM and 5 PM, and on Saturday from 9 AM to 1 PM.
You can contact us on - Phone: 08352-261120, Fax: 08352-262945, Email: principal@bldeacet.ac.in, Web: bldeacet.ac.in
We provide below mentioned courses. Please select one to know more.
What do you want to know about Computer engineering? Please choose further to know.

The Department of Computer Science and Engineering at BLDEACET ranks among the best computer science engineering programs in the state, offering top-tier education and fostering innovation. Established in 1985 with an intake of 30 students, the department has grown to an AICTE-approved intake of 180 students, providing a full-time, four-year undergraduate degree program.
Dr Anil Kannur Professor & Head, Dept. of Computer Science
For more information about CSE department visit this link https://www.bldeacet.ac.in/computer-science-and-engineering.php
Select a category to know the fee
Fee for an OPEN category student is : RS 72000 (Excluding university exam fee)
Fee for an OBC category student is : RS 55000 (Excluding university exam fee)
Fee for a SC/ST category student is RS ABC (Excluding university exam fee)

The criteria for Engineering in JIT are as follows: A minimum aggregate of 50% or equivalent in 10+2.Compulsory Subjects: Physics & Mathematics; and anyone of the following: Chemistry, Computer Science. Minimum passing mark is essential in each of the subject.
The duration for the Engineering offered at BLDEA is 4 years.
What do you want to know about Mechanical engineering? Please choose further to know.

JIT has intake of 20 students for DSY[NOTE: Intake number varies every academic year.]
